languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, рада видеть, что вы в добром здравии. Как только вы проникли на "Странник в пустоши", вокс-связь с вами забили помехами. Авгуры зафиксировали вспышку движения на ковчеге, а астропаты отрапортовали, что чувствуют присутствие не вполне человеческих разумов".

"Lord Captain, I am glad to see you are in good health. As soon as you entered the Wasteland Wayfarer, the vox-link was affected by interference. The augurs recorded a flicker of movement on the ark, and our Astropaths reported the presence of psyches aboard that were not entirely human."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, рада видеть, что вы в добром здравии. Как только вы проникли на "Странник в пустоши", вокс-связь с вами забили помехами. Авгуры зафиксировали вспышку движения на ковчеге, а астропаты отрапортовали, что чувствуют присутствие не вполне человеческих разумов".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I am glad to see you are in good health. As soon as you entered the Void Wanderer, the vox link was affected by interference. The auspex recorded a flicker of movement on the ark, and our astropaths reported the presence of psyches aboard that were not entirely human."

"Lord Captain, I am glad to see you are in good health. As soon as you entered the Void Wanderer, the vox link was affected by interference. The auspex recorded a flicker of movement on the ark, and our astropaths reported the presence of psyches aboard that were not entirely human."

"Lord Captain, I am glad to see you are in good health. As soon as you entered the Void Wanderer, the vox link was affected by interference. The auspex recorded a flicker of movement on the ark, and our astropaths reported the presence of psyches aboard that were not entirely human."

"Lord Captain, I am glad to see you are in good health. As soon as you entered the Wasteland Wayfarer, the vox-link was affected by interference. The augurs recorded a flicker of movement on the ark, and our Astropaths reported the presence of psyches aboard that were not entirely human."

languages.text: “舰长大人，很高兴看到您的状况一切正常。您刚刚踏入荒野旅人号时，音阵连接就受到了干扰。俄写矩阵扫描到了那艘方舟上一闪而过的踪迹。星语者报告说，从那艘船上检测到了灵能的踪迹，不完全来自于人类。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am glad to see you are in good health. As soon as you entered the Wasteland Wayfarer, the vox-link was affected by interference. The augurs recorded a flicker of movement on the ark, and our Astropaths reported the presence of psyches aboard that were not entirely human."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，很高兴看到您的状况一切正常。您刚刚踏入虚空流浪者号时，音阵连接就受到了干扰。俄写矩阵扫描到了那艘方舟上一闪而过的踪迹。星语者报告说，从那艘船上检测到了灵能的踪迹，不完全来自于人类。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, me alegra ver que está en buen estado. En cuanto entró en el Caminante de los Páramos, el enlace de voco sufrió interferencias. Los augures registraron un movimiento fugaz en el arca y nuestros Astrópatas informaron de la presencia de psiques no exactamente humanas a bordo».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am glad to see you are in good health. As soon as you entered the Wasteland Wayfarer, the vox-link was affected by interference. The augurs recorded a flicker of movement on the ark, and our Astropaths reported the presence of psyches aboard that were not entirely human."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, me alegra ver que está en buen estado. En cuanto entró en el Vagabundo del Vacío, el enlace de voco sufrió interferencias. Los augures registraron un movimiento fugaz en el arca y nuestros astrópatas informaron de la presencia de psiques no exactamente humanas a bordo».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ich freue mich, Euch bei guter Gesundheit zu sehen. Kurz nachdem Ihr die Wasteland Wayfarer betreten hattet, wurde der Vox-Link durch Interferenzen gestört. Die Auguren haben auf der Arche schwache Bewegungen aufgezeichnet und laut unserer Astropathen befanden sich an Bord des Schiffes Psychen, die nicht zur Gänze menschlich waren."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am glad to see you are in good health. As soon as you entered the Wasteland Wayfarer, the vox-link was affected by interference. The augurs recorded a flicker of movement on the ark, and our Astropaths reported the presence of psyches aboard that were not entirely human."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ich freue mich, Euch bei guter Gesundheit zu sehen. Kurz nachdem Ihr die Void Wanderer betreten hattet, wurde der Vox-Link durch Interferenzen gestört. Die Auguren haben auf der Arche schwache Bewegungen aufgezeichnet und laut unserer Astropathen befanden sich an Bord des Schiffes Psychen, die nicht zur Gänze menschlich waren."

languages.text: « C'est un soulagement de vous savoir {mf|sain et sauf, seigneur-capitaine|saine et sauve, seigneure-capitaine}. La liaison-vox a connu des interférences dès votre entrée dans le Défricheur. Les augures ont enregistré un semblant de mouvement à bord de l'arche, et nos astropathes ont signalé la présence à son bord de psychés non entièrement humaines. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am glad to see you are in good health. As soon as you entered the Wasteland Wayfarer, the vox-link was affected by interference. The augurs recorded a flicker of movement on the ark, and our Astropaths reported the presence of psyches aboard that were not entirely human."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un soulagement de vous savoir {mf|sain et sauf, seigneur-capitaine|saine et sauve, seigneure-capitaine}. Le lien-vox a été victime d'interférences dès votre entrée dans le Voyageur du Néant. Les augures ont enregistré un semblant de mouvement à bord de l'arche, et nos astropathes ont signalé la présence à son bord de psychés non entièrement humaines. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、お元気そううで何よりです。陛下がウェイストランド・ウェイフェアラー号に入った直後、ヴォクスリンクが干渉の影響を受けました。スキャナーは大型船が一瞬動いたことを記録、さらに感応通信官は船の中に超能力の存在を報告していて、乗船者がすべて人間というわけではないようです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am glad to see you are in good health. As soon as you entered the Wasteland Wayfarer, the vox-link was affected by interference. The augurs recorded a flicker of movement on the ark, and our Astropaths reported the presence of psyches aboard that were not entirely human."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、お元気そううで何よりです。陛下がウェイストランド・ウェイフェアラー号に入った直後、ヴォクスリンクが干渉の影響を受けました。スキャナーは大型船が一瞬動いたことを記録、さらに感応通信官は船の中に超能力の存在を報告していて、乗船者がすべて人間というわけではないようです」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, sizi sıhhatte gördüğüm için çok mutluyum. Çorak Diyar Yolcusu'na girdiğiniz anda voks hattına parazit hâkim oldu. Alametler arkta bazı hafif hareketler kaydetti ve Astropatlarımız, gemideki ruhsezi mevcudiyetinin tamamen insan olmadığını rapor ediyor."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am glad to see you are in good health. As soon as you entered the Wasteland Wayfarer, the vox-link was affected by interference. The augurs recorded a flicker of movement on the ark, and our Astropaths reported the presence of psyches aboard that were not entirely human."
